 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָבַר‎</span>] **verb** ==heap up== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צְבַר‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***prate, chatter, rave***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***collect, bind together***; compare further [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְבֹּר‎</span> [[Gen.41.35|Gen 41:35]]; [[Ps.39.7|Ps 39:7]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּצְבָּרֿ‎</span> [[Zech.9.3|Zech 9:3]], etc.; — ***heap up***, in great quantity: with accusative corn [[Gen.41.35|Gen 41:35]]; [[Gen.41.49|Gen 41:49]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), dead frogs [[Exod.8.10|Exod 8:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), dust [[Hab.1.10|Hab 1:10]], silver like dust [[Zech.9.3|Zech 9:3]]; [[Job.27.16|Job 27:16]], compare (object omitted) [[Ps.39.7|Ps 39:7]].
